name: REFERRAL_APT
description: This table contains information about referral appointments.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE_COUNT
columns.description: A line number that is used to group information about contacts that have counted towards the referral.

columns.name: SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The date of the service (date of the appointment, claim, charge, or admission date) that is associated with the referral

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of service that has been counted as a contact toward the total of completed contacts for this referral.

columns.name: CHARGE_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the charge, if the source is �Charge.�

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the AP Claim, if the source is �Claim�

columns.name: SERIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: The ID number of the contact, if the source is either "Visit" or "Admission"

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the user who performed an override of the counting/contact information, if the source of the contact is "User Override"

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: REASON
columns.description: The reason for the user override, if the source of the contact was "User Override"

columns.name: TABLE_COUNT
columns.description: The number of completed contacts that have been counted for this source.

columns.name: EXT_SVC_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: EXT_SVC_TIME
columns.description: The time associated with the external appointment that was added to the referral.

columns.name: EXT_SVC_POS_ID_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue location.

columns.name: EXT_APPT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the appointment status for external appointments.

columns.name: EXT_APPT_UNIQ_ID
columns.description: This column contains the unique ID for external appointments.

columns.name: EXT_SVC_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the timestamp when the service is performed in UTC format.

columns.name: EXT_SVC_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the external service date and time as an instant in the local time zone.
